articles.description: Solomon Wilcots believes Joe Burrow is a sure-fire franchise quarterback
articles.content:
The Bengals have high expectations for Joe Burrow. The No. 1 pick was dominant in his final season at LSU. 
They believe he has the physical and mental skills to succeed in the NFL. Most people not … [+1876 chars]

articles.title: Dolphins owner Stephen Ross says NFL will 'definitely' play this season amid coronavirus - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: The Dolphins owner isn't sure about fans in the stadium, but he thinks games will happen.
articles.content:
Miami Dolphins owner Stephen Ross might just be using some power of positive thinking, but his comments about this season seem to reflect the optimism of the NFL as a whole.
